title: Trick-or-Treat Family Fun at National Gallery
blurb: Halloween family fun blending art with play!
description: This Halloween family programme blends art with play. Held in the Expression Workshop room at the Gallery’s Keppel Centre for Arts Education (KCAE), children will design their own “Monster-Builders" boxes before embarking on a trick-or-treat trail through selected exhibition spaces. With a playful map in hand, they’ll discover artworks and collect sweet surprises from Gallery staff along the way, ending with refreshments at Bakery Brera Café. The event is suitable for families and includes designing monster builder boxes and a trick or treat trail.
Keyword_tag: Halloween, family, art, play, trick-or-treat, children, Keppel Centre for Arts Education

title: National Gallery Singapore: General Admission
blurb: Explore exhibitions and tours with a General Admission.
description: The National Gallery Singapore offers a variety of exhibitions and tours suitable for families and children. A General Admission ticket grants one-time entry to selected exhibitions and tours, valid for 180 days from the purchase date. Tours include DBS Singapore Gallery Highlights, UOB Southeast Asia Gallery Highlights, and Highlights of the Gallery. Special Exhibition tickets and All Access tickets are also available for entry to all exhibitions and tours. Perfect for families looking to explore art and culture together, the gallery provides an engaging and educational experience for all ages. Enjoy the diverse collection and discover the rich artistic heritage of Singapore and Southeast Asia. The gallery aims to foster an appreciation for art among visitors of all backgrounds, making it a must-visit destination for families.
Keyword_tag: art, exhibitions, tours, family, culture, Singapore, Southeast Asia, gallery, children

title: National Gallery Singapore Trick-or-Treat Family Fun
blurb: Trick-or-Treat Trail through gallery exhibition spaces.
description: Follow a playful map to discover selected artworks and collect candies from playful ghosts (aka our friendly Front-of-House staff) stationed near each piece. Wrap up the adventure with a tea break at Bakery Brera Café. This family-friendly activity is designed for children and their parents to explore art in a fun and engaging way. The trail is approximately 30 minutes long and suitable for all ages. Enjoy a delightful experience combining art, treats, and family bonding in the gallery's unique setting. Perfect for creating lasting memories with your loved ones.
datetime_display: friendly Front-of-House staff) stationed near each piece
Keyword_tag: Trick-or-Treat, family fun, art exploration, gallery activities, kids activities

title: Painting with Light: International Films on Art
blurb: Film festival showcasing moving image and Southeast Asia art.
description: Painting with Light is a film festival dedicated to the study and showcase of the moving image. It presents artist films, documentaries on art, arthouse cinema and restored classics, which mark important moments in art history. The festival’s special focus on Southeast Asian artmaking is evident in a diverse selection of works from the region, including titles newly commissioned and restored by the Gallery, designed to create dialogue between the moving image art of Southeast Asia and the world. Exhibition Gallery Children’s Biennale 2025.
Keyword_tag: Film festival, art films, documentaries, Southeast Asian art, moving image

title: Gallery Children’s Biennale 2025: Tomorrow We’ll Be...
blurb: Inspiring young minds with art at National Gallery Singapore.
description: The Gallery Children's Biennale has been one of National Gallery Singapore’s signature events since 2017, embodying the Gallery's commitment to inspire young and curious minds with art. Exhibition Fernando Zóbel: Order is Essential This survey of his art invites you to travel with Zóbel to North America, Asia and Europe, where he practised from the 1940s to the 1980s. 1 3 Festival Painting with Light: Festival of International Films on Art Dedicated to the study and showcase of the moving image.
Keyword_tag: Children's art, interactive exhibits, family activities, art education

title: National Gallery Singapore Family & Kids Events
blurb: Discover family-friendly events and programmes at Gallery.
description: The National Gallery Singapore offers a variety of engaging programmes and events designed for families and children. These include exhibitions, festivals, tours, and workshops that aim to introduce art in a fun and accessible way. Families can explore the building's history, collections, and archives through interactive activities and guided sessions. The gallery provides a welcoming environment for kids to learn and appreciate art, fostering creativity and curiosity. With a range of activities suitable for different age groups, the National Gallery Singapore is a great place for families to spend quality time together while experiencing art.
Keyword_tag: art exhibitions, family events, kids activities, art workshops, gallery tours
